var.name: env.peer2peer
var.value: 'net':IUT{'iut_host'{{'iut_rpcs':IUT,if:'iut_port'},addr:'iut_addr':inet:unicast,addr:'mcast_addr':ether:multicast,addr:'bcast_addr':ether:broadcast,addr:'iut_alien_mac':ether:alien, addr:'alien_addr':inet:alien},'tst_host'{{'tst_rpcs':tester},addr:'tst_addr':inet:unicast,if:'tst_if',addr:'tst_lladdr':ether:fake, addr:'tst_alien_mac':ether:alien}}

var.name: env.peer2peer_ip6
